mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME , MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID =#{memId} AND MEM_DELETE IS NULL
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_NAME, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_BIR, MEM_ADD1, MEM_MILEAGE FROM MEMBER

WITH CARTVIEW AS( SELECT CART_MEMBER, CART_PROD, PROD_ID, PROD_NAME , PROD_PRICE , LPROD_NM "lprod.lprodNm" FROM CART INNER JOIN PROD ON (CART_PROD = PROD_ID) INNER JOIN LPROD ON (PROD_LGU = LPROD_GU) ) SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASS, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_LIKE, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE , CARTVIEW.* FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTVIEW ON (MEM_ID = CART_MEMBER) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DELETE ='1' WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
